name: Double Click
description: Doubles the amount of cookies per click

name: Triple Click
description: Triples the amount of cookies per click

name: Golden Touch
description: Your clicks now have a chance to give bonus cookies

name: Cookie Rain
description: Occasionally makes cookies rain from the sky

name: Cookie Storm
description: Triggers a massive cookie storm every few minutes

name: Cookie Master
description: Your clicking power is now legendary

name: Cookie God
description: Ascend to cookie godhood with unlimited power

name: Cookie Universe
description: Create an entire universe made of cookies
